Game description

    1950s to the 1970s were the pinnacle of Hong Kong cinema period, what if you had to name the most representative of the period of the film is, of course, it goes without saying that the Hong Kong martial arts. Martial arts star who is now a household name, basically from that era. Now I want to relive the classic movie is not necessarily look at the movie, which are collected in the game "Kung Fu King (Kings of Kung Fu)" being.

    The game has 8 big Boss controllable role and the role of a man, there are 12 different background of the stage. Although the stage like Mortal Kombat and Street Fighter 4 as 9 can not move, but the gameplay is still Tekken, Dead or Alive fighting that 3d gameplay. Each character is very distinctive, rich fighting tactics, game style like 7, 80 years of martial arts, play up that very era movie taste. Games against good sense, there is an arcade mode, training mode, local 2 players, more unfortunately not online gaming.
